ygData.subject: Invalid URI's generated
ygData.msgSnippet: I have received some complains from webmasters regarding Heritrix 3.1.1 creating invalid URI s and thus causing 404s.. Here are a few examples. ...

I have received some complains from webmasters regarding Heritrix 3.1.1 
creating invalid URI's and thus causing 404s..

Here are a few examples.

-----------------
www.sanramonfamilydentistry.com
-----------------

The crawler is generating invalid URI's - (in this case an error page is 
generated stating that the page can't be displayed.)

2012-01-02T21:24:24.832Z   200        728 
http://www.sanramonfamilydentistry. 
LL http://www.sanramonfamilydentistry.com/DentalVideos.aspx unknown 
#1142 20120102212404427+321  sha1:YFOFKZPPSDIEQGV3I6XR6DCVG4PIETIS - -



Excerpt from DentalVideo.aspx source:

.
.
.
</head>
	<body><form name="_ctl0" method="post" action="DentalVideos.aspx" 
id="_ctl0">
<input type="hidden" name="__VIEWSTATE" 
value="" 
/>
.
.
.




-----------------
www.camcycle.org.uk
-----------------
Here is an example of where a couple 404 were generated:
